get.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a YouTube video, including URLs of videos, audios, thumbnails and subtitles as well as related videos and playlists.

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of v in YouTube player URL query parameters.

parameters.name: urlAccess
parameters.description: Accessibility to video/audio URLs. Defaults to normal. normal: Includes video/audio file URLs – 3 quota units blocked: Excludes video/audio file URLs – 1 quota unit

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: videos
parameters.description: Whether to get video objects. Defaults to auto. true: Includes simplified objects. raw: Includes original format objects. false: Excludes objects. auto: If urlAccess=normal, sets videos=true. If urlAccess=blocked, sets videos=false.

parameters.name: audios
parameters.description: Whether to get audio objects. Defaults to auto. true: Includes simplified objects. raw: Includes original format objects. false: Excludes objects. auto: If urlAccess=normal, sets audios=true. If urlAccess=blocked, sets audios=false.

parameters.name: subtitles
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: related
parameters.description: Example value:

get.description: This endpoint lists **available** videos of a YouTube playlist (unavailable ones won't be listed by YouTube). Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails won't be blurred by age safety.

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: Example value: PLeCdlPO-XhWFzEVynMsmosfdRsIZXhZi0

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Default to be en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, playlistId will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube playlist (user created playlist, album or radio playlist).

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: Example value: PLeCdlPO-XhWFzEVynMsmosfdRsIZXhZi0

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: videos
parameters.description: Example value:

post.description: An endpoint to list items with any type of `nextToken`. This allows longer `nextToken` (\u003e4KB) by putting it in the request body instead of the URL/header, bypassing the usual size limit of the URL/header.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. You can only get this string from the response of listing endpoints in this API, like Video > List Video Comments, Search > Search for Channels, and Misc > List Items with Next Token.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

get.description: This endpoint lists YouTube videos related to the hashtag. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: A hashtag without #. Try lowercase (e.g., howtocook, not HowToCook) if no results.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Video type. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, tag and type will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists playlists, releases or podcasts of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. @ is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: playlists - Playlists (default value) releases - Releases (sortBy will be omitted) podcasts - Podcasts (sortBy will be omitted)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to dateAdded.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, channelId, type and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists videos, shorts or live streams of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. @ is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Video type. Defaults to videos.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to newest.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, channelId, type and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube channels. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search term.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to relevance.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, keyword and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube videos (movies) with optional filters. Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails will not be blurred by age safety.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search term.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: movie
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: uploadDate
parameters.description: Upload date. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: all - No duration limit (default value) short - Under 4 minutes medium - 4 - 20 minutes long - Over 20 minutes

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to relevance.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, keyword, movie, uploadDate, duration and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists comments of a YouTube video. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of v in YouTube player URL query parameters.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to top.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, videoId and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists related videos and playlists of a YouTube video. Pagination scraping is supported. It's recommended to get the first page by calling `Video \u003e Get Video Details`, and then get subsequent pages here.

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: YouTube video id. The value of v in YouTube player URL query parameters.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, videoId will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint searches for YouTube playlists. Pagination scraping is supported. Thumbnails will not be blurred by age safety.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search term.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to relevance.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, keyword and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists autocomplete predictions depending on the keyword.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search term.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to US.

get.description: This endpoint lists comments of a YouTube community post. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: Example value: Ugkx-rW0UIVSt9Aw-ux-w16DlRW-wwKwfwnp

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorting metrics. Defaults to top.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, postId and sortBy will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube community post.

parameters.name: postId
parameters.description: Example value: Ugkx-rW0UIVSt9Aw-ux-w16DlRW-wwKwfwnp

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

get.summary: Search for Channel Videos and Playlists
get.description: This endpoint searches for videos and playlists in a YouTube Channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. @ is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search term.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, channelId and keyword will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint lists poll, video, or image posts of a YouTube channel. Pagination scraping is supported.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. @ is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, channelId will be ignored.

get.description: This endpoint fetches details of a YouTube channel.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: Channel ID, custom URL name or handle. @ is required as a prefix for a channel handle.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code (IETF language tag) for localized results. Defaults to en-US. Unsupported code will fallback to en-US.

get.description: This endpoint lets you translate, convert and download a subtitle of a YouTube video. Before doing this, please call endpoint `Video \u003e Get Video Details` to obtain subtitle URLs.

parameters.name: subtitleUrl
parameters.description: Subtitle URL of a YouTube video. To get this, please call Video > Get Video Details first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Subtitle format. Defaults to srt.

parameters.name: fixOverlap
parameters.description: Example value:

parameters.name: targetLang
parameters.description: Target language (IETF language tag) into which the subtitle will be translated. Leave blank to preserve the original language. Unsupported code will fallback to the original language.
